Wwise Unity Integration » Platform-Specific Information

Windows Phone 8.0 Specific information

  • A pre-compiled DLL is not available for Windows Phone 8.0. Instead, the Wwise Unity Integration contains all the necessary files to compile the AkSoundEngineWP8.dll. When a game is built for Windows Phone 8.0 in Unity, a Visual Studio solution is generated. The Wwise Unity Integration then automatically modifies this solution to include the AkSoundEngineWP8 project. When compiling the game in Visual Studio, the Wwise plug-in is compiled at the same time.
